data.fullContent: Above all, Lenore wanted to be an important part of her company's contract management team. The problem was that they didn't think she was capable of carrying out the job. Often when she requested a larger role on the team, they turned her down. Perhaps that was because even though Lenore worked hard and got all her assignments done on time, she always seemed stressed out. One day, one of the managers approached her and asked her what was wrong. Lenore said that she wanted to do more, but the company wasn't giving her a chance. The manager asked her if she thought the company should consider giving her a bigger role on the team, and she said she would be thrilled if they did. He told her not to worry and that he would speak to the rest of the team. Lenore was overjoyed.

q1.translation: 最重要的是，莲娜想成为公司合同管理团队的重要一员。问题是他们认为她没有能力完成这项工作。当她要求在团队中扮演更重要的角色时，他们往往会拒绝她。也许这是因为即使莲娜努力工作，按时完成了所有的作业，她总是看起来压力很大。一天，一位经理找到她，问她出了什么事。莲娜说她想做更多，但公司不给她机会。经理问她是否认为公司应该考虑让她在团队中扮演更重要的角色，她说如果他们这样做了，她会很高兴。

The manager asked her if she thought the company should consider giving her a bigger role on the team, and she said she would be thrilled if they did.

options.sentence: She was so certain of this idea that she didn't hesitate to offer it to him.
The company told her that she could start her job whenever she wanted.
With the company going out of business, Lenore was no longer needed as part of the team.
He told her not to worry and that he would speak to the rest of the team.

options.sentence: Lenore wanted to get a new job because she wasn't being given enough responsibility at her current one.
Lenore's new team was very different from the one she had been on before, but Lenore did her best to learn from them.
Lenore delegated most of her tasks for the reception to her assistant, who was very organized and responsive.
Lenore was turned down most of the time when she requested a larger role, and she always seemed stressed out.
